text: Garfunkel's is a small chain of restaurants in London. It was founded in 1979 by Phillip Kaye,, and is now part of the Restaurant Group. On 3 June 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom, Restaurant Group told employees a "large number" of its Garfunkel's outlets would not reopen after lockdown. ==References== Category:Restaurant chains in the United Kingdom
title: Garfunkel's (restaurant)
